name: Cheat or Lose
description:
You and your friends are playing a fun shedding card game. 

Suddenly you get the feeling that they are working together to make you lose! Luckily, you have the secret power to slow down time. And, since they blink every 10 seconds, you can use this power to your advantage.

Good luck cheating your way to eternal success in this strategy game!

Bug fix #1: Fixed music bug when entering from tutorial
